description: Disables HTTP logging on a Windows IIS web server as seen by Threat Group 3390 (Bronze Union) Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Disable Windows IIS HTTP Logging
query: (process.executable:*\\appcmd.exe AND process.command_line:*set* AND process.command_line:*config* AND process.command_line:*\/section\:httplogging* AND process.command_line:*\/dontLog\:true*)
